casebody.data:
SWAN BEACH COROLLA, L.L.C., Ocean Associates, LP, Little Neck Towers, L.L.C., Gerald Friedman, Nancy Friedman, Charles S. Friedman, 'Til Morning, LLC, and Second Star, LLC, Plaintiffs,
v.
COUNTY OF CURRITUCK; The Currituck County Board of Commissioners; and John D. Rorer, Marion Gilbert, O. Vance Aydlett, Jr., H.M. Petrey, J. Owen Etheridge, Paul Martin, and S. Paul O'Neal as members of the Currituck County Board of Commissioners, Defendants. No. COA17-411 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: June 5, 2018

DISMISSED.
